name: Suzette Quest RECODED_ COLLECTION
description:
Warning: This collection contains flashing imagery, crude humour, mild violence, mild suggestive themes, and may not be appropriate for everyone.

DizzyNPeas' remake/remaster of the first three Suzette Quest games is here! Follow Suzette  and Emilia on a fun quests where they make tons of friends, and fight off weird cult leaders, gangsters, super police officers, and armies of clones!

If you like RPG Maker games, then you'll like the Suzette Quest RECODED_ COLLECTION.

Suzette Quest 2 RECODED_ has yet to be created, so please wait for that.

Estimated playtime:
Suzette Quest RECODED_: 2-5 hours.

Suzette Quest 2 RECODED_:  N/A

Suzette Quest 3 RECODED_: 3-6 hours.

F-Emilia Reunion REOCODED_: 2-5 hours.
